subject: Human Growth Hormone
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: An effective test for detecting human growth hormone will be in place for the Beijing Olympics, the head of the World Anti-Doping Agency said.H.G.H., considered one of the most widely abused performance-enhancing drugs, clears the system quickly, making testing difficult.“By the Olympic Games there will be a capacity to detect H.G.H.,” WADA’s president, John Fahey, said.Fahey said traces of the drug could be detected for up to eight years after a test, meaning users could lose their medals years later.
